name: Escape Your Dreams (Kyuan, Dragondetective, B0o0ne)
description:
Movement: WASD
Jump/Climb: Space Bar
Interact: E
Grab: Left Mouse Button
Pause Menu: Esc

You are dreaming and have to wake up!
Solve the puzzles to escape your dreams.

Team:

  • Nina Utzschneider
    • Lead 3D Artist

    • Level Design

    • Lighting
    • Level Design
    • Programming
  • Jan Michael Götte
    • 3D Art
